attributes.action: Scrap the New Deal for the unemployed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
New Deal is an insult to tax-payers. To ask us to pay for these pointless training courses is sickening. Stop wasting our money on training courses that serve no purpose.

The New Deal training courses are now a proven waste of tax-payers' money:

There are now 37,000 more unemployed people aged 16 to 24 than in May 1997, with the total rising from 665,000 to 702,000, according to the Office for National Statistics. 

As of December 2006, the unemployment rate has risen to 14.5 per cent among young people, overtaking the 14.4 per cent Labour inherited from the Tory Government.
